author: pdobacz
content:
Here is the pre-read doc concerning EOF contract creation proposals: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/EOF-bootstrapping

Current status (EIP-7873 with legacy EVM code enabling TXCREATE opcode) is good, but there was feedback that some features would still be nice to have and there are alternatives to consider. The doc attempts to gather these in one spot and list their differences. We'll discuss this in depth on the [next EOF implementers call this Wednesday](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1429)

author: frangio_
content: thanks for putting this together! i think for others reading the doc it would be useful to explicitly list/summarize what the feedback was, ie. what features it would be nice to have, or maybe to split the table into features and niceness qualities

author: pdobacz
content: üëç I've put in a divider between the features and niceness, as we've already sorted the table - there's just 2 features. And the feedback was I guess just that these features are missing in (3.) :). I'll make note of this, I hope this will be enough for readers to also grasp the feature-niceness split
